text: Va hangome ki dar taqsimi meros xeşovandone ki voris nestand, va jatimon va fuqaroi mustahiq, ki hozir şudand, az in mol, ki ʙeranç va zahmat onro ʙa dast meovared, cize ʙa onho ʙidihed, pas xotiri onhoro taskin (orom) dihed, caro ki dodani in mol ʙa şumo zijone namerasonad va ʙa onho suxani nekū ʙigued
